get.summary: Gets device template by its name

source.description: Source - method from which the log was obtained

action.description:
Action for this boot stage.
Can be: File, CheckPowerSwitch, EmergencyPowerOff,
PowerOff, EmergencyPowerOn, PowerOn,
CheckManagement

For File action:
	A stage can only be marked complete if all files have
	been downloaded by the device via TFTP or DHCP,
	after which the next step can be loaded.

files.description: Files slice of files for boot stage

existingFileName.description:
ExistingFileName file name is a real full file path with name on the disk.
This path is relative from app directory

virtualFileName.description: VirtualFileName virtual file name is relative from /<mac-address>/

emergency.description: Emergency how to control device power in case of emergency. As example: POE(For Rpi4), IPMI, ILO or PowerSwitch

nextBoot.description:
NextBoot how to change next boot device. As example: IPMI, ILO or NONE.
For example, NONE is used for Rpi4, we control next boot by u-boot files in boot stages.

power.description: Power how to control device power. As example: POE(For Rpi4), IPMI, ILO or PowerSwitch

control.description: Control describes how we control the device

discBootStages.description: DiscBootStages slice of boot stage templates for disk boot

netBootStages.description: NetBootStages slice of boot stage templates for net boot

networkInterfaces.description: NetworkInterfaces slice of device network interfaces

ram.description: RAM the amount of RAM in GB

usbbootStages.description: USBBootStages slice of boot stage templates for usb boot

management.description: Management only one network interface can be mark as management

name.description: Name of network interface. This field is unique within device template network interfaces

netBoot.description: NetBoot flags whether the interface can be loaded over the network

poein.description: POEIn only one network interface can be mark as POEIn

poetype.description:
POEType type of PoE for this port
can be: "poe", "poe+", "passive24", "none"

POEType type of PoE for this port
can be: "poe", "poe+", "passive24", "none"

POEType type of PoE for this port
can be: "poe", "poe+", "passive24", "none"

customRequestHeaders.description: CustomRequestHeaders - custom headers of the request

domain.description: Domain - domain that processed the request

source.description: Source - method from which the log was obtained

control.description: Control describes how we control the device
